PageTitle: display bgp flow vpnv4 all update-peer-group
FuncDef: The display bgp flow vpnv4 all update-peer-group command is used to view information about all the update peer-groups in the BGP-Flow VPNv4 address family.
CLIs: display bgp flow vpnv4 all update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp flow vpnv4 all update-peer-group
The Public instance's update peer group number : 1
Keep buffer update peer group number : 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp flow vpnv4 all update-peer-group command is used to view information about all the update peer-groups in the VPNv4 unicast address family.
